from flask import Flask, request
import sqlite3

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/users')
def get_user():
    username = request.args.get('user')
    conn = sqlite3.connect('app.db')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = '" + username + "'"
    cursor.execute(query)
    return str(cursor.fetchall())
